info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Prince Edward and Nottoway Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 214 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Burkeville, or over Crewe, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain could result in localized ponding of water on roadways. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Crewe around 220 PM EDT. Nottoway around 240 PM EDT. Blackstone and Spainville around 300 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include North Wellville, Prince Edward Station, Twin Lakes State Park, Burkes Tavern, Moran, Wellville, Dominy Corner, Fergusonville, Jennings Ordinary and Prince Edward Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
